SYNONYM.Definition: a word that has the same meaning as another

MAMMALS.Definition: warm-blooded animals where the female feeds the young with her own milk

PORPOISES.Definition: a sea animal similar to a dolphin

BALEEN.Definition: the grill feeding system used by baleen whales

MISCONCEPTION.Definition: an idea that is wrong because people don't understand the subject properly

PLANKTON.Definition: very small plants and animals that float on the surface of the sea

HOOVERING UP.Definition: eating in a manner similar to a vacuum cleaner

WHISTLES.Definition: high sounds created by forcing air through a small hole

IMITATE.Definition: behave in a similar way to

INNATE.Definition: something you were born with, not learned

OCTAVES.Definition: an octave is the distance between 8 musical notes

GOSSIPING.Definition: having a conversation about someone's life, normally without their knowledge

HARPOON.Definition: a long, heavy spear, attached to a rope

EXTINCTION.Definition: when a particular kind of animal no longer exists

DISCONCERTING.Definition: making you feel confused or worried

ENDANGERED.Definition: to be in danger of extinction
